meanings.definition: A person who commits the crime of intentionally setting fire to property.
meanings.sent1: The arsonist was caught red-handed setting fire to the abandoned building.
meanings.sent2: The police arrested the arsonist for burning down the forest.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy arsonist accidentally set fire to his own car while trying to light a cigarette.
meanings.sent4: Her anger was like an arsonist, burning everything in its path.
meanings.sent5: The sinister figure of the arsonist lurked in the shadows, waiting to strike again.

meanings.sent1: The arsonist left a trail of destruction behind him as he set fire to multiple buildings.
meanings.sent2: Neighbors suspected the arsonist was behind the series of fires in the area.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous arsonist played with matches, unaware of the danger he posed.
meanings.sent4: The arsonist's actions ignited a chain of events that led to chaos in the town.
meanings.sent5: The community lived in fear of the arsonist's next target, always on edge.
